case.get_case: Nyeem tag nrho cov ntaub ntawv teev tseg hauv lub luag haujlwm
case.update_case: Hloov kho txhua qhov xwm txheej tau teev tseg hauv lub luag haujlwm

convos.list_convos: Tau txais txhua qhov kev sib tham
convos.notify_participants: Qhia rau cov neeg koom nrog kev sib tham
convos.remove_participants: Tshem cov neeg koom nrog kev sib tham
convos.list_comments: Tau txais tag nrho cov lus qhia rau kev sib tham
convos.submit_comment: Tawm tswv yim ntawm kev sib tham
convos.modify_comment: Hloov kho cov lus qhia ntawm kev sib tham
convos.delete_comment: Rho tawm ib nqe lus ntawm kev sib tham

events.list_events: Tau txais txhua yam xwm txheej
events.modify_event: Tsim lossis hloov kho qhov xwm txheej
events.delete_event: Rho tawm ib qho kev tshwm sim
events.submit_response: RSVP rau ib qho kev tshwm sim

posts.list_posts: Tau txais tag nrho cov ntawv
posts.modify_post: Tsim lossis hloov kho ib qho kev tshaj tawm
posts.list_comments: Tau txais tag nrho cov lus pom rau kev tshaj tawm
posts.submit_comment: Muab lus rau ib tug ncej
posts.modify_comment: Hloov kho cov lus pom ntawm ib qho kev tshaj tawm
posts.delete_comment: Tshem tawm cov lus pom ntawm ib qho kev tshaj tawm

forms.modify_form: Tsim lossis hloov kho daim foos
forms.list_responses: Tau txais txhua daim ntawv xa tuaj
forms.delete_response: Rho tawm ib daim ntawv xa tuaj

signs.modify_sign: Tsim lossis hloov kho ib qho kos npe
signs.delete_sign: Rho tawm ib qho kos npe
signs.list_comments: Tau txais tag nrho cov lus pom rau kos npe
signs.submit_comment: Tawm tswv yim rau ntawm ib qho kos npe
signs.modify_comment: Hloov kho cov lus pom ntawm lub cim
signs.delete_comment: Rho tawm ib qho lus ntawm ib qho kos npe
signs.list_responses: Tau txais txhua daim ntawv kos npe
signs.delete_response: Rho tawm daim ntawv kos npe

invoices.list_invoices: Tau txais tag nrho cov ntawv xa nyiaj
invoices.modify_invoice: Tsim lossis hloov kho daim ntawv xa nyiaj
invoices.delete_invoice: Rho tawm ib daim ntawv xa nyiaj
invoices.moderate_invoices: Cov ntawv sau nqi nruab nrab
invoices.pay_invoice: Them ib daim ntawv xa nyiaj

notes.modify_note: Tsim lossis hloov kho ib daim ntawv

tasks.modify_task: Tsim lossis hloov kho ib txoj haujlwm

tasks.submit_comment: Tawm tswv yim rau ib txoj hauj lwm

tasks.delete_comment: Tshem tawm cov lus pom ntawm ib txoj haujlwm
tasks.list_responses: Tau txais tag nrho cov lus teb ua haujlwm
tasks.modify_response: Hloov kho cov xwm txheej ntawm txoj haujlwm
